CREATE TRIGGER trg_after_payment_insert AFTER INSERT ON TBL_PAYMENT FOR EACH ROW BEGIN UPDATE TBL_PAYMENT SET PAY_EXPIRED_DATE = DATE_ADD(NEW.PAY_REG_DATE, INTERVAL NEW.PAY_PERIOD DAY) WHERE PAY_NO = NEW.PAY_NO;
-- 회원 등급을 1로 업데이트 UPDATE TBL_MEMBER SET M_GRADE = 1 WHERE M_NO = NEW.M_NO; END;
